Test Methods & SOPs

Standard Operating Procuedres ensure your accrediated lab is complies with state rules and delivers data that is consistnely accurate and reproducible. SOPs contain all the steps necessary to perform a test without "tribal knowledge".

Lab Instruments

Staffing & Training

Staff are hired on the basis of the qualifications mandated by state and local regulations as well as standards set forth by accreidaiton bodies. A minimum, all staff posses some cannabis industry experience and scientific background.

Marketing & Accounts

Basic Marketing pieces uniquely designed for your project including business cards, laboratory employee badges, letterhead etc. Account setup with laboratory instrument companies as needed such as: Restek, Shimadzu and LabDaq.

Minimal Research & Development Required

We take the uncertainty and error out of establishing an accredited laboratory.

Industry Knowledge and Experience

At TCL Consulting we use our experience in the cannabis industry to develop your cannabis testing laboratory in a timely manner. We will help avoid any of these issues and at the same time ensure your facility meets ISO 17025 (International Organization for Standardization), NELAP TNI (National Environmental Laboratory Accreditation Program) and NEFAP (National Environmental Field Activities Program) accreditation standards and field sampling protocols.

100% Client Commitment

TCLâ€™s objective is good customer service while setting up your accredited laboratory for the purpose of testing cannabis products. Completing an accredited laboratory is a very time consuming endeavor requiring industry knowledge and experience that can take from 12 months to over 18 months to implement. Additionally, since there is no standard methodology, everything must be created and verified from scratch and mistakes can increase that timeline considerably.
